member.name: IMFCameraControlDefaults.GetRangeInfo
member.summary: Gets information about the accepted range, step value, and default value for a camera control.
member.param: Receives a pointer to a structure representing the range information for the control.

returns.para: | Value | Description | | S_OK | Success | | MF_E_NOT_FOUND | The control does not support basic range values. |

member.name: IMFCameraControlDefaults.GetType
member.summary: Gets the configuration type of the control, indicating whether the control value must be set before streaming begins or after streaming has started.
member.returns: A member of the enumeration specifying the configuration type of the control.

member.name: IMFCameraControlDefaults.LockControlData
member.summary: Retrieves the data payload for the control associated with the IMFCameraControlDefaults instance, allowing clients to modify the control value directly.
member.param: Receives a pointer to the control being locked.
Receives the size of the structure pointed to by control.
Receives a pointer to the data payload of the control.
Receives the size of the buffer pointed to by dataSize.

member.name: IMFCameraControlDefaults.UnlockControlData
member.summary: Unlocks the control data buffer unlocked with a call to .

member.name: IMFCameraControlDefaults
member.summary: Provides methods for specifying camera control default values.
